content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 Aug 2018What are your views on DollarDex? Is it better than other RSP platforms such as POSB Invest-Saver?Seems like they offer zero platform fees and sales charges? Does that make it better than other RSP platforms such as POSB Invest-Saver?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Good Day Every DayLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Oct 2018Dollardex offers only unit trusts whereas POSB offers equities and bonds etf. For Dollardex, customers can enjoy zero sales charge, platform fees and switching fees but they need to pay management fees. For POSB, customers have to pay management fees and commissions. 0 comments0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Aug 2018Different instruments offered. Dollardex offers only mutual funds / unit trusts if memory serves me right. Whereas posb offers either the STI ETF or a bond fund. There's still management fees to be paid for both platforms, but posb's should be significantly lower. 0 comments0
